text: 52nd Street is the sixth studio album by Billy Joel and released on 11 October, 1978 through Columbia Records. It topped the album charts in Australia, Canada, New Zealand and the United States. It is a follow-up to his breakthrough album The Stranger and won 2 Grammy Awards. ==Track listing== All songs written and composed by Billy Joel. Category:1978 albums Category:Billy Joel albums
title: 52nd Street (album)
